AboutPage.title: About InvoicingCat
AboutPage.subtitle: InvoicingCat is a fast, simple, and free invoice generator made for freelancers, small business owners, and anyone who needs clean invoices without signing up or giving away their data. Everything is stored locally in your browser ‚Äî no accounts, no cloud, no tracking.
AboutPage.metaDescription: Discover InvoicingCat ‚Äî a free, privacy-first invoice generator for freelancers and small businesses. No accounts, no cloud. Fast, local, and easy to use.

AboutHero.title: About InvoicingCat
AboutHero.subtitle: InvoicingCat is a fast, simple, and free invoice generator made for freelancers, small business owners, and anyone who needs clean invoices without signing up or giving away their data. Everything is stored locally in your browser ‚Äî no accounts, no cloud, no tracking.

WhyPeopleLove.title: Why people love it
WhyPeopleLove.instantUse: <bold>Instant to use</bold> ‚Äî no setup, no loading times
WhyPeopleLove.privacyFirst: <bold>Privacy-first</bold> ‚Äî no data ever leaves your device
WhyPeopleLove.completelyFree: <bold>Completely free</bold> ‚Äî no trials, no limits, no hidden fees
WhyPeopleLove.localized: <bold>Multi-language & multi-currency</bold> ‚Äî designed to work across countries
WhyPeopleLove.offlineReady: <bold>Offline-ready</bold> ‚Äî works even without internet (soon as a PWA)

TechnicalPerks.title: Technical perks
TechnicalPerks.techStack: Built using modern web tech (React, Next.js, Chakra UI, IndexedDB)
TechnicalPerks.noServers: Stores data locally ‚Äî no server or account needed
TechnicalPerks.features: Supports invoice history, multiple clients, and PDF export
TechnicalPerks.currencies: Supports 20+ currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, INR, BRL, and more)

SupportedCountries.title: Supported Countries
SupportedCountries.paragraph: InvoicingCat is ideal for freelancers and businesses across Europe, North America, South America, and Asia, with support for custom currencies, taxes, and locale-based formatting.

ContactUs.title: Want to say hi?
